org.event
Class Spine

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<String,Set<Reflexive>>
          org.event.Spine
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ConcurrentMap<String,Set<Reflexive>>, Map<String,Set<Reflexive>>
public class Spine
extends ConcurrentHashMap<String,Set<Reflexive>>

Represents stimuli with associated reflexes.

When a stimulus occurs, appropriate reflexes are triggered.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Detail

Spine

public Spine()
Create a spine.

Associate reflexes to stimuli with on(...).

Spine

public Spine(Class cls)
Create a spine from class.

on<stimulus>() static methods are associated <stimulus> stimulus.
Use @Speed("slow") annotation to indicate slow reflex methods.

Parameters:
cls - class containing reflex methods

Spine

public Spine(Object obj)
Create a spine from object.

on<stimulus>() instance methods are associated <stimulus> stimulus.
Use @Speed("slow") annotation to indicate slow reflex methods.

Parameters:
obj - object containing reflex methods
